House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07976
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE CONSTRUCTION OF PUBLIC RESTROOMS ALONG NATIONAL AND PROVINCIAL HIGHWAYS THROUGHOUT THE COUNTRY, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Provides for the construction of public restrooms every 30 to 50 kilometers apart along national and provincial roads nationwide. Allows the Sanggunian/NGO of the particular barangay where it is situated to collect reasonable usage fee which shall be used for the development projects of the corresponding barangay.
ALIAS NAME : “Land Transport Support Facilities for Hygiene and Convenience Act.”
